articles.description: The Senegalese goalkeeper is one of the lowest-paid players in the Blues squad but rejected the first proposal because the terms were inferior to his understudy Kepa, who is on £190,000 a week.
articles.content:
Edouard Mendy has knocked back Chelsea's opening offer of a new contract.
The Senegalese goalkeeper is one of the lowest-paid players in the Blues squad but rejected the first proposal because the t… [+2007 chars]

articles.author: Max Mathews
articles.title: Toni Kroos slams Premier League money chasers after Casemiro joined Man Utd - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Real Madrid midfielder's words come after former Los Blancos team-mate Casemiro joined Manchester United on a four-year, £375,000-a-week deal in August.
articles.content:
Toni Kroos has blasted players who move to the Premier League for money alone.
The Real Madrid midfielder's words come after former Los Blancos team-mate Casemiro joined Manchester United on a four-… [+2089 chars]

articles.author: Jack Bezants
articles.title: US Open champion Matt Fitzpatrick told his attitude was 'A DISGRACE' by his caddie - Daily Mail
articles.description: He received the phone call from Billy Foster which served as wake-up call while he was at dinner with his parents after the RBC Heritage, where he had missed the cut.
articles.content:
Just two months before lifting the first major of his career, Matt Fitzpatrick received a rocket from his caddie, the esteemed Billy Foster.
Fitzpatrick, 28 and widely considered one of the more ami… [+2571 chars]
